definition: opposing sides (in chess etc)/position (of opposing forces)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Chess, game, the player using these pieces go first son.
sentences.chinese: 围棋，对局时，执黑子的先走。

sentences.english: Thanks to the special effort by badman hero_jang and hing most of the games were completed successfully.
sentences.chinese: 由于网管的努力，比赛的大部分对局都圆满地完成了。

sentences.english: The calculation shows that the Baiyangdian Lake has an regulative and progressive effect on the local climate.
sentences.chinese: 计算表明，白洋淀对局地气候有调节和改良作用。

sentences.english: Valid for accepting all game invitations.
sentences.chinese: 能接受全部人的邀请对局。

sentences.english: Four-bet folding is one of the cardinal sins in poker.
sentences.chinese: 四次加注后弃牌是扑克对局中重要的错误之一。

sentences.english: Person in charge on behalf of all elderly nursing home Youth League game of the sympathy expressed his thanks.
sentences.chinese: 敬老院负责人代表全体老人对局团委的慰问表示感谢。

sentences.english: Like the previous two installments, each of the three match-ups will be broken down.
sentences.chinese: 像前两部门一样，三种对局会一一叙述。

sentences.english: In league stage everyone play head to head.
sentences.chinese: 在联赛阶段都将和每位玩家对局。

sentences.english: Conclusion MRI can accurately show the focal osteochondral lesions.
sentences.chinese: 结论MRI对局灶性骨软骨损伤的显示准确。

definition: player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
to hang up (a phone)/to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)
draw or tie in chess etc/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
rank/class/(Japanese martial arts and board games) dan
kifu (record of a game of go or shogi)
state of play in a game of chess/(old) chessboard
